p: Virtually-selected drug-like compounds were used in admetSAR online tool (Immd.ecust.edu.cn/admetsar2) to evaluate their level of toxicity. This program predicts toxic effects—such as carcinogenicity, mutagenicity, irritant effect, reproductivity and drug-like physical and chemical properties of compounds—which can help for selection of compounds that can be used as safe antiviral agents on humans.
